summary: This is my tweaked version of Snapdragon Prime ENB. I just tried to make the interior lighting nicer for character screenshots. You can decide if it is an improvement or not.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ffff][size=3]This is my modified snap dragon prime enb preset.
[/size][/color][/b]I use this enb purely for character screenshots. The quality and DoF will murder your frames so I do not suggest this for regular gameplay experience.
The above statement is the reason that my screenshots representing the ENB are only pictures of my character.
What I edited was subsurface scattering and environment settings to enhance the interior lighting and make a good effect on character skin/shadows/translucency, shine, etc. I also disabled the bloom and lens.

[color=#a4c2f4][size=2]Yes, I gave 100% dp to the original author.
Yes, here is a link to the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/]original mod[/url] and the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/981329]original author[/url].[/size][/color]

[b][color=#00ffff][size=3]Things to note for installation:[/size][/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*][size=2]You must download the latest enb files from enbdev.com (right now it's V.0349). Once downloaded, extract. Go into the wrapper version folder and get only the "enbhost.exe" and the "d3d9.dll" then put both of those into your skyrim folder.[/size]
[*][size=2]You do not need the original enb preset.[/size]
[*][size=2]Download [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/]NLA[/url]﻿ (natural lighting and atmospherics). Extract it and delete everything except the .esp file - now re-pack it and use this (or throw it into your skyrim data folder).[/size]
[*][size=2]Download [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043]ELFX[/url]﻿ (enhanced lights and fx) and in the installer window, you want to get the interior and exterior enhancers.[/size]
[/list][size=2][color=#00ff00]
[b]body used[/b] - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91453]dangerous oppai uunp preset[/url]﻿
[b]skin used[/b] - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/]fair skin complexion[/url]﻿ overwritten by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88131]unslaad pale unp[/url]﻿ textures.

[b]Location[/b] - the modded location is goma pero land v4. I HIGHLY recommend this modded location for character screenshots. Everywhere has perfect soft white lighting and the decorations and attention to detail is SUPERB![/color][/size]
author: wnisewond
